rows.label: tev010801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev010801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Quincy about the recently discovered survivors.

rows.label: tev010801_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev010801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Quincy if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev010801_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Quincy about the Curators division.

rows.label: tev010801_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Quincy about Soul Voices.

rows.label: tev010801_SEL0091
rows.name: Ask Quincy about his thoughts on Lao's betrayal.

rows.label: tev010801_SEL0111
rows.name: Ask Quincy about the Earthlife Colonization Project.

rows.label: tev010801_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Quincy about recent developments.

rows.label: tev010801_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Quincy about recent developments.

rows.label: tev010801_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Quincy if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0001
rows.name:
Director General Chausson announced that 10 new
crew members have been discovered![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0003
rows.name:
Those people are our lost soul mates! The last surviving
crew members that came with us from Earth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'm so glad that they survived. We'll have to say a
prayer for our new friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0005
rows.name:
I wonder if they'll become BLADEs? If they do,
I think I'll invite them to join my team![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0009
rows.name:
Every division hosts a number of different teams. There's
all sorts of reasons why BLADE operatives team up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0010
rows.name:
Some teams are intentionally formed to pair BLADEs
with complimentary abilities together, while others are
just groups of BLADEs who were free at the same time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0011
rows.name:
But the best teams are the ones like mine—true friends
who work well together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0012
rows.name:
Do you know Gus? He's another team leader, and he
always expresses great admiration for how well my
team work together. I think he's a little jealous.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0013
rows.name:
I sure hope that you're able to find a good group of
friends to team up with here in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0021
rows.name:
Our main duties as Curators are surveying Mira
and gathering collectibles and other resources.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0022
rows.name:
Visiting unexplored lands to find and collect such
materials can be an extremely dangerous job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0023
rows.name:
A number of Curators have already lost their lives in
the line of duty. But Team Quincy has nothing to fear
so long as we're protected by the power of friendship![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0024
rows.name:
We're going to find all of Mira's hidden treasures
and bring them back home to New LA! Go team![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0039
rows.name:
When Team Quincy encounters one of the dangerous
creatures that populate Mira, we know what to do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0040
rows.name:
We call out to each other, appraise the situation, and
stir up our souls that reside deep within us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0041
rows.name:
We fellow BLADEs are soul mates, and our voices
reverberate between our souls! Soul Voices![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0042
rows.name:
With a good command of Soul Voices, you won't have
any reason to fear. Even these new enemy xenoforms
will be easy pickings for the likes of you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0043
rows.name:
Make sure you listen to the voices of your teammates
during battle and energize your soul![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0078
rows.name:
I never imagined that a fellow BLADE would defect
to the Ganglion like that. We're soul mates![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0079
rows.name: That sort of thing just isn't supposed to happen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0080
rows.name:
I'm sure the Ganglion just found some weakness of his
and threatened him with it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0081
rows.name:
The Ganglion are using their cowardly tactics to pull at
the bonds of love which unite us. We can't let them get
away with it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0085
rows.name:
My family wasn't able to secure a berth on the White
Whale either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0086
rows.name:
But that's exactly why I consider the surviving crew—
especially my fellow BLADE soul mates—as my new
family.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0087
rows.name:
There was a lot of controversy around the selection
process, and I know a lot of people were upset.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0088
rows.name:
But what's done is done, and there's no point living in
the past. Now is the time to forge new bonds,
look straight ahead, and march to a brighter future![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0053
rows.name:
Our remaining objectives have been completed.
I believe my companions can rest in peace.
Thank you so much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0054
rows.name: Looking back on it, I have a lot of pity for Gus.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0055
rows.name:
He never got to experience the depth of love we
BLADEs share. He only ever let heartless greed
drive him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0056
rows.name:
And then he died alone, having never experienced the
powerful emotions we feel for each other.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0057
rows.name:
To be honest, I suppose it does bother me that I was
taken in by Gus like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0058
rows.name:
But I'm happy that the experience led me to become
friends with as wonderful a BLADE as yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0059
rows.name:
Knowing good people like you makes me all the more
confident that my teammates were right to trust Gus,
even though it cost them their lives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0060
rows.name:
I'm going to keep walking the righteous path—I won't
let this experience make me lose trust in my fellow man.
I have you to thank for that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0061
rows.name:
Have you heard the stories about how the Celeste Three
worked together to assault people?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0062
rows.name:
Their front man, Fosdyke, had been a popular and
widely-trusted member of the White Whale's crew.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0063
rows.name:
I can't believe Fosdyke was involved with this.
How could he have forgotten the oath he swore when
the White Whale set off from Earth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0064
rows.name:
But then I remember that there are also righteous
BLADEs like you who are worthy soul mates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010801_MSG0065
rows.name:
To maintain the unity of BLADE when traitors emerge,
we righteous men and women simply have to grasp
hands all the tighter. ...Right?[ST:wait ]
